page.title: 15Interviews 1
page.content:
{Three people were interviewed;}one man, one woman and one boy.
The man,{Mr. Wright has lived in the {village since 1971.}There had been no changes since, and{he worked on a {farm,}which he rented.{There was no {entertainment,}so he went out of the village. He said that 500 years ago, it was as big as Thetford, and as important.
{He liked the village. It was quiet, {with the wildlife:}woodpeckers, lots of deer and rare birds.{He rents 3000 {acres of land}and owns 500 acres at Bridgeham. He had two dogs. His {ancestors were not local.}He imagined that there was a lot of poaching. He saw a policeman maybe once a month.
contd on P16
